overview: The Wilde House is set in the lush, exclusive neighborhood of Bel-Air. Behind its thick walls, Mr. Wilde has collected L.A.'s hottest "models and escorts"...and these super studs know just how to satisfy Mr. Wilde's special "clients," and each other! A new hunky arrival to the house sets off the sexual fireworks, so fasten your seat belts!
title: Wilde House
